appName.description: The full name of the extension as displayed in the browser.

appDesc.message: Control Webex meeting recordings with keyboard shortcuts. Use arrow keys to skip forward/backward, up/down arrows to adjust playback speed, and spacebar to pause/play. Fully customizable skip time and speed increments.
appDesc.description: Detailed description of what the extension does for users.

skipTimeDescription.description: Help text explaining the skip time setting.

speedIncrementDescription.description: Help text explaining the speed increment setting.
